an6.28:1.1: Ekam samayam sambahula thera bhikkhu baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
an6.28:1.2: Atha kho tesam theranam bhikkhunam pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkantanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an6.28:1.3: “ko nu kho, avuso, samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitun”ti?
an6.28:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.28:2.2: “yasmim, avuso, samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto pade pakkhaletva nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva, so samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitun”ti.
an6.28:3.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
an6.28:3.2: “na kho, avuso, so samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:3.3: Yasmim, avuso, samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto pade pakkhaletva nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva, carittakilamathopissa tasmim samaye appatippassaddho hoti, bhattakilamathopissa tasmim samaye appatippassaddho hoti.
an6.28:3.4: Tasma so asamayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:3.5: Yasmim, avuso, samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito viharapacchayayam nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva, so samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitun”ti.
an6.28:4.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
an6.28:4.2: “na kho, avuso, so samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:4.3: Yasmim, avuso, samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito viharapacchayayam nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva, yadevassa diva samadhinimittam manasikatam hoti tadevassa tasmim samaye samudacarati.
an6.28:4.4: Tasma so asamayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:4.5: Yasmim, avuso, samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva, so samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitun”ti.
an6.28:5.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
an6.28:5.2: “na kho, avuso, so samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:5.3: Yasmim, avuso, samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya nisinno hoti pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva, ojatthayissa tasmim samaye kayo hoti phasussa hoti buddhanam sasanam manasi katum.
an6.28:5.4: Tasma so asamayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitun”ti.
an6.28:6.1: Evam vutte ayasma mahakaccano there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.28:6.2: “sammukha metam, avuso, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an6.28:6.3: ‘chayime, bhikkhu, samaya manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:7.2: Idha, bhikkhu, yasmim samaye bhikkhu kamaragapariyutthitena cetasa viharati kamaragaparetena, uppannassa ca kamaragassa nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanati, tasmim samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
an6.28:7.3: “aham kho, avuso, kamaragapariyutthitena cetasa viharami kamaragaparetena, uppannassa ca kamaragassa nissaranam yathabhutam nappajanami.
an6.28:7.4: Sadhu vata me ayasma kamaragassa pahanaya dhammam desetu”ti.
an6.28:7.5: Tassa manobhavaniyo bhikkhu kamaragassa pahanaya dhammam deseti.
an6.28:7.6: Ayam, bhikkhu, pathamo samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum.
an6.28:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, yasmim samaye bhikkhu byapadapariyutthitena cetasa viharati …pe….
an6.28:12.1: Yam nimittam agamma yam nimittam manasikaroto anantara asavanam khayo hoti, tam nimittam na janati na passati, tasmim samaye manobhavaniyo bhikkhu upasankamitva evamassa vacaniyo:
an6.28:12.2: “aham kho, avuso, yam nimittam agamma yam nimittam manasikaroto anantara asavanam khayo hoti tam nimittam na janami na passami.
an6.28:12.3: Sadhu vata me ayasma asavanam khayaya dhammam desetu”ti.
an6.28:12.4: Tassa manobhavaniyo bhikkhu asavanam khayaya dhammam deseti.
an6.28:12.5: Ayam, bhikkhu, chattho samayo manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitum’.
an6.28:13.1: Sammukha metam, avuso, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an6.28:13.2: ‘ime kho, bhikkhu, cha samaya manobhavaniyassa bhikkhuno dassanaya upasankamitun’”ti.
